# Syllables of Mandarin Chinese for the Gwoyeu Romatzyh romanisation system.
#   * Yuen Ren Chao: A Grammar of Spoken Chinese. University of California
# Gwoyeu Romatzyh syllables were derived from the PinyinSyllable table using
# the PinyinGRMapping table. For reference the syllables can be obtained by the
# following SQL command: SELECT GR from PinyinGRMapping;
